00033 <?php

00039 $timeB[0] = 12;                                 //beginning time (24 hour time)
00040 $timeS[0] = 12.5;                                       //ending time
00041 $day1[0] = 0;                                   //first day of the week
00042 $day2[0] = 2;                                   //second day, -1 if none
00043 $day3[0] = 4;                                   //third day, -1 if none
00044 $type[0] = '';                                  //type for class
00045 
00046 $textArray[1] = 'multimedia';                   //text
00047 $timeB[1] = 12.5;                                       //beginning time
00048 $timeS[1] = 13.5;                                       //ending time
00049 $day1[1] = 0;                                   //first day of the week
00050 $day2[1] = 2;                                   //second day, -1 if none
00051 $day3[1] = 4;                                   //third day, -1 if none
00052 $type[1] = 'lec';                                       //type for class
00053 
00054 $textArray[2] = 'driving';                      //text
00055 $timeB[2] = 12.5;                                       //beginning time
00056 $timeS[2] = 13;                                 //ending time
00057 $day1[2] = 1;                                   //first day of the week
00058 $day2[2] = 3;                                   //second day, -1 if none
00059 $day3[2] = -1;                                  //third day, -1 if none
00060 $type[2] = '';                                  //type for class
00061 
00062 $textArray[3] = 'Theater';                      //text
00063 $timeB[3] = 13;                                 //beginning time
00064 $timeS[3] = 14.5;                                       //ending time
00065 $day1[3] = 1;                                   //first day of the week
00066 $day2[3] = 3;                                   //second day, -1 if none
00067 $day3[3] = -1;                                  //third day, -1 if none
00068 $type[3] = 'lec';                                       //type for class
00069 
00070 
00071 $hold = array(0,0,0,0,0,0,0); /* for long time blocks (need to figure out data validation here)
00072 if time scedualed activities overlap second one just wont show up, easyest */
00073 
00074 $begintime = 8;                                         //start time of sceduale
00075 $endtime = 23;                                  //endtime of sceduale
00076 
00077 //time increments are set on 10 = 1 hour, or 1 = 6 minutes
00078 //monday = 0; sunday = 6;
00079 
00080 function writeCell($time, $day) {
00081         global $textArray;
00082         global $timeB;
00083         global $timeS;
00084         global $day1;
00085         global $day2;
00086         global $day3;
00087         global $type;
00088         global $hold;
00089         global $day;
00090         global $time;
00091         $cellSet = "false";
00092         
00093         for($i = 0; $i < count($textArray); $i++) {
00094                 if ($time == $timeB[$i] * 10) {
00095                         $duration = ($timeS[$i] - $timeB[$i]) * 2;
00096                         
00097                         if ($day1[$i] == $day || $day2[$i] == $day || $day3[$i] == $day) {
00098                                 echo (" <td ");
00099                                 echo ("class = \"$type[$i]\" ");
00100                                 echo ("rowspan = \"$duration\">");
00101                                 echo ("$textArray[$i]");
00102                                 //echo ("$duration");
00103                                 echo ("</td>\n");
00104                                 if ($duration > 1) {
00105                                         $hold[$day] = $duration - 1;
00106                                 }
00107                                 $i = count($textArray);
00108                                 $cellSet = "true";
00109                         }
00110                 }
00111         }
00112         if ($cellSet == "false") {                                      //handle empty time block
00113                 echo ("<td rowspan=\"1\"></td>\n");
00114         }
00115 }
00116 
00117 for ($time = $begintime * 10; $time <= $endtime * 10; $time += 5) {
00118         echo (" <tr>\n");                                                       //begin row
00119         if ($time % 10 == 0) {
00120                 echo ("<th class=\"time\" rowspan=\"2\">");
00121                 $hour = $time / 10;
00122                 echo ("$hour");
00123                 echo (":00</th>\n");
00124         }
00125         for ($day = 0; $day < 7; $day++) {
00126                 if ($hold[$day] > 0) {                                  //look for hold
00127                         $hold[$day]--;
00128                 } else {                                                        //look for time match
00129                         writeCell($time, $day);
00130                 }
00131         }
00132         echo ("</tr>");
00133 } ?>
